main event: On the night of 7 February 1949, several military personnel at Godman Air Force Base, Ft Knox, observed a strange bright object in the sky which was later believed to be the star Sirius.
interesting points: The object appeared to change colors (red, green, yellow) and seemed to be rotating,The observations were made by multiple witnesses including weather observers and a tower operator, The sighting lasted for exactly 20 minutes before the object disappeared suddenly, The object was tracked using a theodolite which measured its angles and position, The witnesses were instructed to report unusual objects and were using binoculars to observe.
sighted object: a bright object changing colors in the sky
witness description: military personnel including a tower operator and weather observers
